channel.title: EclispeRSC is here
channel.description:
[code]Gold Drop List & Location :
- Spider training spot - Npc's there drop a proper amount of gold
- Dragon Isle - All the Npc's there drop a proper amount of gold
- Edgeville - All the Npc's there drop a proper amount of gold
- Ice Caves Instance - All the Npc's there drop a proper amount of gold
Rune Drops :
- Lesser Demon - Drops full rune * Located in wild or in dragon isle *
- Greater Demon - Drops full rune * Located in the wilderness *
Dragon Drops :
- King Green Dragon - Drops full dragon armor * Located in dragon isle *
- King Black Dragon - Drops full dragon armor * Billy ports you to kbd lair *
- Rock of Ages - Drops full dragon armor * Located by castle and atlar *
- Red Dragon / Blue Dragon - Drops dragon axe and long * Located by castle and atlar *[/code]
More to come
Webclient is up and running for Beta testing purposes only.
*Someone ban me for spreading keylogs*
Enjoy!
PS: First 5 People will be staff to get things going faster, but just because you get it doesnt mean you won't loose it. ;)
